pull.title: v0.9 release notes formatting fixes
pull.body: I cleaned up the release notes with various formatting fixes. Other than three minor wording changes the textual content should be unchanged.

events.body: Please squash the changes into one commit

events.body: @laanwj Done. I left them separated for review, but whatever works for you.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/31a4b898be9beef6041006fbc9063b2880f488a6 for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
I really like that in the case of code changes, but for reformatting the release notes you don't need to go to that level of micromanagement :)
